title: (x) Looking for Honda FL350 1985 typo - custom, similar to MTV2C {Mike Y}
content:
Maybe it's my lucky day! Tx for your help

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [FL350\_Decals2.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20141012030503/http:/typophile.com/files/FL350_Decals2_0.jpg) | 12.76 KB |
author: matttwo

comments.content:
From this time period you are probably looking at artwork (ruler drawn) or maybe a photo (film) typeface. I do not know of an exact match for this, but I found a free font that I think could easily be made to look like it. See [MTV2C](http://web.archive.org/web/20141012030503/http:/www.abstractfonts.com/font/13011?text=ODYSSEY350) at Abstract Fonts. If you square off the appropriate corners, add vertical serifs to the 3 and then slant the result, I think you are there.

- Mike Yanega
All I can say is: thank you! Nice match...
